mapper.insert: insert into vote_list values(vote_list_seq.nextval, #{vl_title}, sysdate, #{vl_end_date},#{vl_type}, default)
insert into vote_option values(vote_option_seq.nextval, vote_list_seq.currval, #{value}, default)
mapper.select: select count(*) from vote_check where vc_vote_seq = #{vc_vote_seq} and vc_vote_id = #{vc_vote_id}
select l.* from vote_list l join vote_check c on (l.vl_seq = c.vc_vote_seq) where vc_vote_id = #{value}
mapper.update: update vote_option set vo_count = vo_count + 1 where vo_seq = #{value}
update vote_list set vl_count = vl_count + 1 where vl_seq = #{value}
mapper.select: select sum(vo_count) from vote_option where vo_vote_seq = #{value}
select * from vote_option where vo_vote_seq = #{value} order by vo_count desc
